mapper.insert: INSERT INTO beer ( name_kr, name_en, type, upload_state, update_state, abv, ibu, srm, country_id, region, category_id, price, description, history, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{nameKr}, #{nameEn}, #{type}, #{uploadState}, #{updateState}, #{abv}, #{ibu}, #{srm}, #{countryId}, #{region}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{description}, #{history}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM beer WHERE LOWER(name_en) = LOWER(#{keyword})
